text:
@ProfKarolSikora @PrisonPlanet There is no comparison and u trying to make 1 frankly is deeply concerning. Cancer is well known to us,  is not contagious. Huge amount of treatments, research investment on it.
#COVID19 is heavily contagious. We don't know bottom of it, we don't know treatments....1/2
